• Theoretischer Hintergrund
      • Wirkungsgrad
      • Energieumsatzberechnung
        • Aerobe Energiekomponente (WAER)
        • Anaerobe- laktazide Energiekomponente (WBLC)
        • Anaerobe- alaktazide Energiekomponente (WPCr)
      • Innere Arbeit
      • Radfahren im Sitzen und Stehen
    • Methodik
      • Stichprobe
      • Messmethoden
      • Studiendesign
    • Ergebnisse
      • VO2-Belastungsdaten
      • EPOC-Daten
      • Laktat-Leistungs-Beziehung
      • Ergometer Daten
        • Torque Efficiency
        • Innere Arbeit
        • Pedal Smoothness

    # In diPrampero1981
#deltaHPC = 46 + 1.0 kJ • mol-1 nach (Wilkie 1968)

#deltaP is relatively unaffected by PC concentration, varying from 52 to 44 kJ/mol for a de- crease of PC from 15 to 4 mmol/kg.

#deltaH and deltaG indicate the enthalpy (free energy) change per mole advancement of the reaction

#Weitere WErte in einer Tabell und in Mahler1979

#In diPrampero1973

##Assuming also that 20-25 kg of muscle are involved in this exercise, i.e., 30-35% of the total body weight, the amount of phosphagen split per kilogram of active muscle amounts to 24-28 mmole.

: Parameter Bi-Exponentialfunktion - M, moderate; H, heavy; VH, very
heavy; S, severe exercise intensities

``` r
# In diPrampero1981
#deltaHPC = 46 + 1.0 kJ • mol-1 nach (Wilkie 1968)

#deltaP is relatively unaffected by PC concentration, varying from 52 to 44 kJ/mol for a de- crease of PC from 15 to 4 mmol/kg.

#deltaH and deltaG indicate the enthalpy (free energy) change per mole advancement of the reaction

#Weitere WErte in einer Tabell und in Mahler1979

#In diPrampero1973

##Assuming also that 20-25 kg of muscle are involved in this exercise, i.e., 30-35% of the total body weight, the amount of phosphagen split per kilogram of active muscle amounts to 24-28 mmole.
```

### Tabelle körpereigene Energiespeicher

+------+------+------+------+------+------+
| Qu   | ATP  | ATP  | CrP  | U    | Nut  |
| elle | -Spe | -    | -Spe | mrec | zbar |
|      | i    | Rate | i    | h    |      |
|      | cher |      | cher | nung |      |
|      |      |      |      | s    |      |
|      |      |      |      | rate |      |
+======+======+======+======+======+======+
| \    |      |      |      | ATP: |      |
